DOC.brief_summary: Subcutaneous heparin injection one frequent nurse ' clinical care . This study aim Identify compare effect four different injection duration pain bruising associate subcutaneous injection heparin 90 patient . Four injection method use : A : 10 injection duration B : 10 injection duration wait 10 withdraw needle C : 15 injection duration wait 5 withdraw needle D : 5 injection duration wait 15 withdraw needle . Bruising measure flexible millimeter ruler 48h injection ; pain measure pain visual analogue scale immediately injection . Data analyze SPSS .
DOC.brief_title: Comparing Pain Bruising Subcutaneous Heparin Injection
DOC.criteria: Inclination participate study ; fill form conscious satisfaction Ability answer question determine rate pain Not affect blood clotting difficulty , tissue damage , injury , bruise site injection . Death , Discharge
